meanings.definition: A person who is not very intelligent or serious.
meanings.sent1: The bubbleheads in the class always made silly jokes.
meanings.sent2: The teacher found it hard to take the bubbleheads seriously.
meanings.sent3: The bubbleheads at the party kept laughing at everything.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was surrounded by bubbleheads, lost in their own world.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bubbleheads giggling together stuck in her mind.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are not very intelligent or serious.
meanings.sent1: The bubbleheads in the meeting couldn't focus on the agenda.
meanings.sent2: The team was known for being a bunch of bubbleheads, always goofing off.
meanings.sent3: The bubbleheads at the office party were the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: The crowd of bubbleheads seemed to float through the day without a care.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the chatter of bubbleheads, their laughter echoing.
